latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Violations corrected at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers not provided have not been inspected and tagged prior to camp season
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Fire drills are not conducted within first 48 hours of session and periodically thereafter Drill log not maintained and available for inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Adequate insurance coverage was not obtained prior to camping season Does not includes workers compensation comprehensive liability and/or motor vehicle insurance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Parental authorization for camp to respond to emergencies as appropriate in absence of parental contact not on file
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: All camper and staff injuries illness and conditions reportable pursuant to HC Article 11 were not reported Medical log not complete and/or updated
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards
